definition[0]: a type of rubber material that can stretch and then return to its usual length or size
definition[2]: a material that is elastic can stretch and then go back to its usual length or size
example[2]: the horny elastic pad in a horse’s hoof
definition[3]: a system or plan that is elastic can change or be changed easily
example[3]: Demand for this type of holiday will probably be fairly elastic.
definition[4]: if a piece of clothing is elastic, it is made with material that can stretch
example[4]: children’s pants with an elastic waist
